column4: So something is iffy with my 3D acceleration (I think?).  nvidia drivers are loaded (X.Org 7.0) and Quake 3 plays fine, but other games have major graphical glitchiness whereas they didn't, oh, a week or two ago.
What should I do to run some sort of diagnostic on my graphics acceleration to find what might be the problem?
Could my recent upgrade from X.Org 6.9 --> 7.0 have anything to do with this?
